author: Al Jazeera
title: Hong Kong to test everyone on island for COVID three times over
description: Mass compulsory testing plan to begin in the middle of March, as the territory struggles to get control of Omicron wave.
content: Hong Kong has announced plans to roll out compulsory COVID-19 testing from next month, with each of the densely-populated territorys 7.4 million residents required to submit to three rounds of tests.â€¦ [+3133 chars]
